init program
delete not allowed
-- Check if markcode is already added, duplicates are not allowed
-- Finance markcode already exists (only in case of new CMCD rows)
-- Mark code does not exists
-- Percenatge must be <= 100
Not tempclient
Validation Date is today or Tempclient
load physical
init new
